headline.main: For Afghan Lovers, Joy Is Brief, Ending in Arrest
headline.print_headline: For Afghan Lovers, Joy Is Brief, Ending in Arrest

docs.abstract: Plight of Afghan couple Mohammad Ali and his pregnant wife Zakia has brought attention to culture's treatment of those accused of social crimes; having married against wishes of his wife's family, Ali is charged with kidnapping, which carries death penalty in Afghanistan; Zakia's family members have publicly declared their attention to kill her for dishonoring them by marrying outside her ethnic group; she has taken refuge in a women's shelter.
